statements: SELECT * FROM robotic_system_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT system_name, speed FROM robotic_system_data WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT id, system_name, efficiency FROM robotic_system_data WHERE efficiency < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM robotic_system_data WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT system_name, speed, efficiency FROM robotic_system_data WHERE speed > 50 AND efficiency > 0.6 ORDER BY efficiency DESC, speed ASC;
SELECT id, system_name, data_timestamp, speed, efficiency FROM robotic_system_data ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT system_name, speed FROM robotic_system_data WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY speed ASC
SELECT * FROM robotic_system_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND efficiency < 0.6
SELECT id, system_name, data_timestamp FROM robotic_system_data WHERE speed > 80 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC
SELECT system_name, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM robotic_system_data GROUP BY system_name HAVING avg_speed > 70
SELECT * FROM robotic_systems WHERE status='Active';
SELECT robot_name, start_time FROM robotic_systems ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT robot_name, status FROM robotic_systems WHERE status='Inactive';
SELECT id, robot_name, end_time FROM robotic_systems ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE cpu_usage > 50;
SELECT * FROM robotic_systems WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT robot_name, start_time FROM robotic_systems WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01' AND end_time IS NULL;
SELECT robot_name, start_time, end_time, status FROM robotic_systems ORDER BY robot_name ASC, end_time DESC;
SELECT robot_name, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM robotic_systems GROUP BY robot_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT r.robot_name, pd.cpu_usage, pd.memory_usage, pd.temperature FROM robotic_systems r JOIN performance_data pd ON r.id = pd.robot_id WHERE r.status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM robotic_systems_data;
SELECT system_name, performance_metric FROM robotic_systems_data;
SELECT system_name, capture_timestamp FROM robotic_systems_data WHERE performance_metric > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM system_component_data ORDER BY component_name DESC;
SELECT system_id, COUNT(component_id) AS total_components FROM system_component_data GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT * FROM robotic_systems_data ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_name, performance_metric FROM robotic_systems_data WHERE performance_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;

SELECT system_name, component_name, component_status FROM robotic_systems_data rs JOIN system_component_data sc ON rs.id = sc.system_id WHERE rs.system_name LIKE 'System%' AND sc.component_status = 'Active';
SELECT system_id, COUNT(component_id) AS total_components FROM system_component_data GROUP BY system_id HAVING total_components > 5 ORDER BY total_components DESC;

SELECT system_id, optimization_status, COUNT(workflow_id) AS total_workflows FROM workflow_optimization WHERE optimization_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY system_id, optimization_status ORDER BY system_id ASC,total_workflows DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoboticSystems ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, production_capacity FROM RoboticSystems WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT installation_date, system_name FROM RoboticSystems WHERE robotic_system_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_id, performance_score FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE error_code = 'ERROR' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoboticSystems ORDER BY system_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT system_name, production_capacity, installation_date FROM RoboticSystems WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT system_name, MAX(production_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM RoboticSystems;

SELECT robot.system_name, metric.timestamp, workflow.optimization_strategy FROM PerformanceMetrics AS metric JOIN RoboticSystems AS robot ON metric.robotic_system_id = robot.robotic_system_id JOIN WorkflowOptimization AS workflow ON metric.metric_id = workflow.metric_id;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM Robot WHERE robot_type = 'Industrial';
SELECT robot_name AS Name, manufacturing_date AS 'Manf. Date' FROM Robot ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Workstation WHERE location = 'Factory A' AND workstation_name LIKE 'Assembly%';

SELECT Robot.robot_name, Workstation.workstation_name, ProductionLog.start_time FROM Robot JOIN ProductionLog ON Robot.robot_id = ProductionLog.robot_id JOIN Workstation ON ProductionLog.workstation_id = Workstation.workstation_id;
SELECT * FROM Robot WHERE robot_type = 'Android';
SELECT robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM Robot WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, start_time, end_time, performance_score FROM ProductionLog WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE issue_description LIKE '%malfunction%';

SELECT robot_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM Robot INNER JOIN ProductionLog ON Robot.robot_id = ProductionLog.robot_id INNER JOIN Workstation ON ProductionLog.workstation_id = Workstation.workstation_id ORDER BY start_time DESC;
